CutScene.Text: And so Lord Bane was finally defeated, but as he had told Lord Albion many centuries before: you cannot defeat Death, merely cheat it for a while.
This time however, Sartek, God of the Minotaurs, intervened. He ground Bane's body beneath his mighty hooves until it was dust, and then he tore Bane's very soul into 5 pieces.
The world moves in cycles... Lord Bane's time had passed, but another power was set to arise in the Realms of Death - one that had humble beginnings deep within the Kingdom of Agaria.
Would this new power serve the light? Or would it serve the darkness? Only time would tell...
